snippet.title: Steel Hunters: It's a Squad Effort!
snippet.description:
Our latest trailer highlights the importance of communication and teamwork in Steel Hunters. All footage was recorded in-engine on our premier map: Maryland Heights.

Register for the closed Alpha and make your Last Stand: https://survey.steelhunters.com/s3/2e66b986b418

Are you looking for a new and exciting free game to play on your PC? Look no further than Steel Hunters. This upcoming free-to-play video game is set in a post-apocalyptic future earth and lets you take control of giant fighting machines called Hunters. Not only will you get to fight against other players in an attempt to be the last team standing, but you'll also get to enjoy a beautiful and realistic environment powered by Unreal Engine. So, if you're looking for a new game that is easy to pick up, but has a lot of tactical depth, be sure to sign up!
